title: Enchanting Kundan Peacock Haaram with Emerald Accents
materials: meticulously set with high-quality Kundan stones
and sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Crafted with a special Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting radiant finish.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a captivating peacock motif on either side of the central floral design, symbolizing beauty and grace. The Kundan stones are intricately placed in a classic Pachi setting, highlighted by the vibrant green of the Emeralds. The central cluster boasts a prominent green emerald surrounded by purple stones, adding a touch of regal elegance. Delicate gold dangles enhance the overall design, creating a beautiful interplay of light and movement.
colors: white (from the Kundan and CZ stones)
and purple for the small accent stones
creating a rich and captivating palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)
and festive celebrations. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and formal events.
description: This Kundan Peacock Haaram is a unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The use of high-quality Kundan stones and the addition of Emerald accents elevate this piece, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The durable Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting brilliance and enhances the overall value of this investment. A true statement piece that embodies elegance and sophistication.
